name: Room Escape - Gold Coins
description:
New Sensation "Room Escape Game". A player can move and look around freely. Let's enjoy the realistic 3D space! A lot of gimmicks are waiting for you.

[Features]
- Somewhat realistic 3D Game
- First Person View like VR style
- Objects can be pick up & throw & examine
- Jump and Crouch
- Item System
- Exploration & Adventure
- Mystery & Horror
- Puzzles & Doors
- Collect gold coins!


Give it a try right now!!

***** Works with iPhone5+, iPad Air+ *****


Next area is under development.
Coming Soon!
